text: Putot-en-Bessin (, literally Putot in Bessin) is a former commune in the Calvados department in the Normandy region in northwestern France. On 1 January 2017, it was merged into the new commune Thue et Mue.Arrêté préfectoral 8 September 2016 ==Population== ==See also== *Communes of the Calvados department ==References== ==External links== *Official site Category:Former communes of Calvados (department) Category:Calvados communes articles needing translation from French Wikipedia
title: Putot-en-Bessin
